body_html:
I'm not sure why but I am unable to do a Bazel PIP build past cuDNN.

I'm using the instructions and forked TF from here.
https://gist.github.com/ageitgey/819a51afa4613649bd18

TF_UNOFFICIAL_SETTING=1 ./configure
bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer

TF_BazelPIPBuild_TerminalOutput.txt

body:
I'm not sure why but I am unable to do a Bazel PIP build past cuDNN.

I'm using the instructions and forked TF from here.
https://gist.github.com/ageitgey/819a51afa4613649bd18

TF_UNOFFICIAL_SETTING=1 ./configure
bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer
